reviews.title: The Five-Star Weekend
reviews.author: Elin Hilderband
reviews.summary: After tragedy strikes, Hollis Shaw gathers four friends from different stages in her life to spend an unforgettable weekend on Nantucket.
reviews.review: 5 stars for The Five-Star Weekend! I cant pick one thing I didnt like about this book, it was truly perfection in my eyes..

reviews.title: The Wife App
reviews.author: Carolyn Mackler
reviews.summary: Because every wife deserves a happy ending.
reviews.review: I really liked the concept of this book a lot. I was instantly intrigued by the idea of an app where you can sign up and then fairly pay someone to do the never ending tasks that seem to traditionally fall on the wife in our society.
